meanings.definition: A person who receives a share of something, especially an inheritance.
meanings.sent1: The distributees were happy to receive their inheritance.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer informed the distributees about their share of the estate.
meanings.sent3: The distributees threw a party to celebrate their inheritance.
meanings.sent4: The distributees were like bees to honey when the inheritance was announced.
meanings.sent5: The faces of the distributees lit up with joy upon hearing the news.

meanings.definition: Those who are entitled to receive a portion of assets or property.
meanings.sent1: The distributees eagerly awaited their portion of the assets.
meanings.sent2: The will clearly outlined the rights of the distributees to the property.
meanings.sent3: The distributees joked about becoming property magnets.
meanings.sent4: The distributees stood out like stars in the night sky among the other heirs.
meanings.sent5: The distributees' claim to the property was as solid as a rock.
